settings.name: StockOutList
settings.select: a.[StockOutID], a.[OriType], a.OriCode, a.[StockOutCode], dbo.f_Getcodename('备件出库类型',a.TradeType) TradeType, a.[OutTime], a.[StockID], a.CorpManager, b.StockName, a.[CorpManager], a.[CustomerID], d.CustomerName, d.MobileTel, d.[Address], a.[Remark], a.[TotalAmount], a.BillState, CASE WHEN a.BillState=1 then '已审' ELSE '未审' END BillStateName, a.[InputTime], a.[InputName], a.[AuditName], a.[AuditTime], ISNULL(v.IsUnderStock,0) IsUnderStock
settings.from: P_StockOutHead AS a LEFT JOIN Base_Stock AS b ON a.StockID = b.StockID LEFT JOIN B_Customer AS d ON a.CustomerID = d.CustomerID LEFT JOIN view_partsOutStock v ON a.StockOutCode = v.BillCode

settings.name: InventoryList
settings.select: a.[SparePartCode], a.SparePartName, a.Spec, a.Unit, a.[Upper], a.[Lower], a.[StockID], s.StockName, a.[Price], a.Quantity, c.PartTypeName, d.OrderPartsQty, ISNULL(a.Quantity,0)-ISNULL(d.OrderPartsQty,0) UsableQty
settings.from: P_AssemStorage AS a LEFT JOIN B_SparePartType c ON a.PartTypeID = c.PartTypeID LEFT JOIN Base_Stock s ON a.StockID=s.StockID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.CorpID, d.SparePartCode, SUM(d.Quantity) OrderPartsQty FROM P_SellOrderDetail d INNER JOIN P_SellOrderHead h ON d.SellOrderCode = h.SellOrderCode WHERE h.BillState = 1 AND IsPay = 1 AND IsOut = 0 GROUP BY d.CorpID,d.SparePartCode ) d ON d.SparePartCode = a.SparePartCode AND d.corpID = a.CorpID
